TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InstallContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含关于当前安装的信息。

span.span: Contains information about the current installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，创建由的安装可执行文件，如 InstallUtil.exe，安装程序集。Typically, an is created by an installation executable, such as InstallUtil.exe, that installs assemblies. 安装程序时，将调用构造函数，将其传递默认日志文件路径和命令行参数。The installation program invokes the constructor, passing it the default log-file path and command-line parameters. 之前调用其， ， ，或方法，该安装程序会设置属性到的实例。Prior to calling its , , , or methods, the installation program sets the property of an to the instance of . 在调用这些方法之前包含中的安装程序集合属性集的每个包含的安装程序的属性。Before calling these methods, an that contains an installer collection in the property sets the property of each contained installer. 属性包含已分析的版本的命令行输入运行可执行安装。The property contains a parsed version of the command line that is entered to run the installation executable. 属性包含信息，例如日志文件、 是否将日志信息显示在控制台上，以及是否在安装过程中显示用户界面的路径。The property contains information such as the path to a log file, whether to display log information on the console, and whether to show a user interface during the installation. 调用方法，以找出是否命令行参数为`true`。Call the method to find out whether a command-line parameter is `true`. 使用方法将状态消息写入到安装日志文件和控制台。Use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. ## Examples 下面的示例演示构造函数，属性和和方法类。The following example demonstrates the constructors, the property and the and methods of the class. 当调用安装程序的方法时，它会检查从命令行参数。When the method of the installer is called, it checks for parameters from the command line. 具体取决于，它将显示在控制台上的进度消息，并还将其保存到指定的日志文件。Depending on that, it displays the progress messages onto the console and also saves it to the specified log file. 当程序调用不带任何参数，一个空创建。When the program is invoked without any arguments, an empty is created. 当"/ 日志文件"和"/ LogtoConsole"指定，通过将传递到各自的自变量创建。When "/LogFile" and "/LogtoConsole" are specified, the is created by passing the respective arguments to . [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#1)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载不创建安装日志文件。This overload does not create a log file for the installation. ## Examples > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用的重载版本之一构造函数。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of the constructor. 有关可能会提供其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. 当程序调用不带任何参数，一个空创建。When the program is invoked without any arguments, an empty is created. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#2)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string logFilePath, string[] commandLine) cil managed
Public Sub New (logFilePath As String, commandLine As String())

param.name: logFilePath
param.span: 此安装的日志文件的路径，或者如果无须创建日志文件，则为 。

span.span: The path to the log file for this installation, or if no log file should be created.

param.name: commandLine
param.span: 运行安装程序时输入的命令行参数，或者如果未输入任何内容，则为 。

span.span: The command-line parameters entered when running the installation program, or if none were entered.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并创建安装的日志文件。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, and creates a log file for the installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果安装使用[Installutil.exe （安装程序工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)，此构造函数在指定的路径创建一个日志文件，并分析到命令行参数的数组属性。If the installation uses [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md), this constructor creates a log file at the specified path and parses the array of command-line parameters into the property. 如果在命令行参数中指定的日志文件路径，则它用于创建文件。If a log-file path is specified in the command-line parameters, it is used to create the file. 如果在命令行中的值未指定日志文件参数`logFilePath`使用参数。If the log file argument is not specified in the command line, the value of the `logFilePath` parameter is used. 若要禁止显示日志文件的创建，请将传递"/ 日志文件 ="命令行参数。To suppress the creation of a log file, pass the "/logfile= " command-line parameter. ## Examples 此示例摘自类概述中的示例类。This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of class. 当"/ 日志文件"和"/ LogtoConsole"指定，通过将传递到各自的自变量创建。When "/LogFile" and "/LogtoConsole" are specified, the is created by passing the respective arguments to . [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#3)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#3)]

para.span: 将在你默认日志文件路径传递参数时调用此构造函数。

span.span: Pass your default log-file path in the parameter when you call this constructor.

para.span: 这就是创建日志文件，除非运行安装可执行文件时使用 /logfile 命令行参数。

span.span: This is the where the log file is created, unless the /logfile command-line parameter is used when the installation executable is run.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsParameterTrue(string paramName) cil managed
Public Function IsParameterTrue (paramName As String) As Boolean

param.name: paramName
param.span: 要检查的命令行参数的名称。

span.span: The name of the command-line parameter to check.

summary.span: 确定指定的命令行参数是否为 。

span.span: Determines whether the specified command-line parameter is .

returns.span: 如果指定的参数设置为“是”、“真”、“1”或空字符串 ("")，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified parameter is set to "yes", "true", "1", or an empty string (""); otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法访问属性，其中包含要确定是否存在指定的参数的命令行参数的已分析的版本`true`。This method accesses the property, which contains a parsed version of the command-line parameters, to determine whether the specified parameter is `true`. ## Examples 此示例摘自类概述中的示例类。This example is an excerpt of the sample in the class overview of the class. 它使用方法若要查明`LogtoConsole`参数已设置。It uses the method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set. 如果`yes`，然后将使用方法将状态消息写入到安装日志文件和控制台。If `yes`, it will then use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#4)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LogMessage(string message) cil managed

summary.span: 将消息写入控制台和安装的日志文件。

span.span: Writes a message to the console and to the log file for the installation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安装程序可以调用此方法以写入日志文件的进度或其他状态信息。An installer can call this method to write progress or other status information to the log file. 如果命令行参数指定应显示用户界面，安装程序应显示消息框或使查询调用除了方法。If the command-line parameters specify that a user interface should be displayed, the installer should show message boxes or make queries in addition to calling the method. 写入日志文件的文本将不会被发现用户除非 InstallUtil.exe 用于运行安装和"/ LogToConsole = true"命令行中指定。Text written to the log file will not be seen by the user unless InstallUtil.exe is used to run the installation and "/LogToConsole= true" is specified in the command line. ## Examples 此示例摘自类概述中的示例类。This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of class. 它使用方法若要查明`LogtoConsole`参数已设置。It uses the method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set. 如果`yes`，然后将使用方法将状态消息写入到安装日志文件和控制台。If `yes`, it will then use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#4)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As StringDictionary

summary.span: 获取在运行 InstallUtil.exe 时输入的命令行参数。

span.span: Gets the command-line parameters that were entered when InstallUtil.exe was run.

value.span: 一个 ，它代表运行可执行安装文件时输入的命令行参数。

span.span: A that represents the command-line parameters that were entered when the installation executable was run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当新创建后，命令行参数解析为属性。When a new is created, the command-line parameters are parsed into the property. 密钥和参数的值是字符串。Both the keys and the values of the parameters are strings. ## Examples 此示例摘自类概述中的示例类。This example is an excerpt of the example in the class overview of class. 该示例检索属性以查看用户是否输入的任何命令行自变量。The sample retrieves the property to see if any command line argument has been entered by the user. 它还使用方法若要查明`LogtoConsole`参数已设置。It also uses the method to find out if the `LogtoConsole` parameter has been set. 如果`yes`，然后将使用方法将状态消息写入到安装日志文件和控制台。If `yes`, it will then use the method to write status messages to the installation log file and the console. [!code-cpp[InstallContext_InstallContext#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CPP/installcontext_installcontext.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[InstallContext_InstallContext#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/CS/installcontext_installcontext.cs#6)] [!code-vb[InstallContext_InstallContext#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/InstallContext_InstallContext/VB/installcontext_installcontext.vb#6)]
